title: Ask a Local - Food
description: Ask the nearest local (in their native language, of course), where they like to eat. Go there!

title: Coffee? Coffee? Coffee...
description: Grab a coffee of your choice from the third coffee shop you come across.

title: Lunch With a View
description: Grab some lunch, look up the nearest viewpoint, head there, now you have lunch with a view!

title: Fast Food
description: Grab something from the nearest fast-food chain that is unique to the country you're in.

title: When in [currentCountry]!
description: Make sure you go the whole day only eating when the locals typically do.

title: Grocery Store
description: Purchase a regional snack (like a bag of chips or something) from the local grocery store. Bonus points if this can't be found anywhere else.

title: Chef's Special
description: When ordering, ask your server to bring you what they recommend.

title: Order Up
description: Order food all day in the local language.
